name: Glameow

evolution.description: Glameow can evolve into Purugly at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Catty Pokémon. It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to being paralyzed.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.
